text: "Memories & Dust" is a song by Australian singer-songwriter Josh Pyke. It was released in October 2006 as the lead single from Pyke's debut studio album, Memories & Dust (2007). The song peaked at number 39 on the ARIA Charts. ==Track list== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2006) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2006 singles Category:2006 songs Category:Josh Pyke songs
title: Memories & Dust (song)
